text:
I always wanted to be a teacher.When i leaved my highschool, this was my dreamjob. Giving my knowledge to student is something very grateful, and i consider this job the most beautiful for me.
My inspiration come from a teacher i had when i was in elementary school. His name was Alex Dupont, and she was so fascinating: his passion for teaching, his involvement to the class, and his joy and hapiness she had gave to me the inspiration to do this job.My determination for becoming a teacher never leaves me. When i was in college, i did an intership in my elementary school. I was so excited for helping Alex Dupont in his class, but it didn't happen the way i wanted it to: the principal putting me in nursery school with young kids. It was a bad experience for me who wanted to attend elementary classes.
After this event, i was lost for what i wanted to do.
I started to think about other jobs, but nothing interested me.
Finally, in my last highschool's year, i had an historian teacher who was one of the most passionate i've ever met. His classes were so interesting that i didn't see the year pass. His passion for giving his knowledge is the reason why i chose educational sciences.
